name: make_api_requests_http_card
title: Make API Requests with the HTTP Request Card
description: In many organizations that integrate with web services, there is a requirement to be able to invoke a SaaS application (or on-premise API secured via an API gateway) secured Http(s) end-point. This sample illustrates the use of the Okta Workflows HTTP Raw Request card for GET, POST operations with sample Content-Type of json and x-www-form-urlencoded. It also illustrates how to process JSON using a variety of Okta workflow cards.
